titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of Jo. Bill and Chris. Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the three and twentieth of March, 1670/1. In the three and twentieth year of our reign."
Ordering Catholic clergy into exile and the enforcement of the Penal laws against Catholic recusants.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
